common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. define: Retrieve all current targeted campaigns created by the seller

error_list.name: error_business
error_list.description: Sorry you don't have access to AMS features.

error_list.name: error_business
error_list.description: Please agree to the AMS T&C in Seller Center - Affiliate Marketing Solutions first before using Open API.

error_list.name: error_business
error_list.description: The seller commission operation is frozen.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the \"page_size\" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call), and the \"page_no\" to start next call. This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single \"page\" of data. The limit of page_size if between 1 and 100.

","name":"page_size","sample":"20","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"ktKMiXr"},{"description":"

Specifies the page number of data to return in the current call. Starting from 1. if data is more than one page, the page_no can be some entry to start next call.

","name":"page_no","sample":"1","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"fCbNKP"},{"description":"

The list of campaign_id for query, different campaign id should be split by comma and at most 50 campaigns.

","name":"campaign_id_list","sample":"101,102,103","type":"string","required":"False","key":"TkenwNQ"},{"description":"

Campaign name for query.

","name":"campaign_name","sample":"campaign a","type":"string","required":"False","key":"kTFZAFb"},{"description":"

Campaign status for query. Applicable values: 

Upcoming
Ongoing
Ended
Cancelled
Draft
Terminating
Terminated
Paused

","name":"campaign_status","sample":"Upcoming","type":"string","required":"False","key":"HyTmire"},{"description":"

Campaign period start time for query.

","name":"period_start_time","sample":"1735660800","type":"timestamp","required":"False","key":"Gmerbdj"},{"description":"

Campaign period end time for query.

","name":"period_end_time","sample":"32503651199","type":"timestamp","required":"False","key":"DCwXfh"},{"description":"

Item id for query.

","name":"item_id","sample":"101","type":"int64","required":"False","key":"RBnXmBS"},{"description":"

Item name for query.

","name":"item_name","sample":"product a","type":"string","required":"False","key":"jSmBPSr"}],"response_params":[{"description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"error","sample":"error_business","type":"string","required":null,"key":"dASHKFs"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"Please agree to the AMS T&C in Seller Center - Affiliate Marketing Solutions first before using Open API.","type":"string","required":null,"key":"cFxbbsY"},{"description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","name":"request_id","sample":"b937c04e554847789cbf3fe33a0ad5f1","type":"string","required":null,"key":"WGKNWtK"},{"description":"

Detail informations you are querying.

","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"RHMEQfQ","children":[{"description":"

The total count of targeted campaigns that meet the query criteria.

","name":"total_count","sample":"30","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"SDzfxAX"},{"description":"

Targeted campaign list.

","name":"commission_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"AdBjEXS","children":[{"description":"

The unique key for the current campaign.

","name":"campaign_id","sample":"101","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"NcRDhdx"},{"description":"

The name of the current campaign.

","name":"campaign_name","sample":"campaign a","type":"string","required":null,"key":"FjCrfHG"},{"description":"

Campaign Status: 

Upcoming
Ongoing
Ended
Cancelled
Draft
Terminating
Terminated
Paused

","name":"campaign_status","sample":"Ongoing","type":"string","required":null,"key":"mxEzNRW"},{"description":"

Source of campaign setup. Applicable values: 
- ShopeeManaged (Note: You cannot view the details or edit this campaign. If you try to do so, an 'invalid campaign_id' error will occur.)
- Seller
- Unknown

","name":"campaign_source","sample":"Seller","type":"string","required":null,"key":"DyXPrCH"},{"description":"

The start time of the current campaign.

","name":"period_start_time","sample":"1735660800","type":"timestamp","required":null,"key":"RCsZFca"},{"description":"

The end time of the current campaign, if get 32503651199 (2999-12-31 23:59:59), it means no limit

","name":"period_end_time","sample":"32503651199","type":"timestamp","required":null,"key":"wZcGiwT"},{"description":"

The last editor of the current campaign.

","name":"last_editor","sample":"example@example.com","type":"string","required":null,"key":"CwTyEdR"},{"description":"

The last edit time of the current campaign.

","name":"last_edit_time","sample":"1735660800","type":"timestamp","required":null,"key":"FpNyCSf"},{"description":"

The total count of affiliates associated with the current campaign.

","name":"affiliate_count","sample":"20","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"aPxWECt"},{"description":"

The total count of items associated with the current campaign.

","name":"item_count","sample":"20","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"TADXZcP"},{"description":"

The min commission rate of the current campaign.

","name":"min_rate","sample":"10.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"mbrDTCm"},{"description":"

The max commission rate of the current campaign.

","name":"max_rate","sample":"25.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"rJTpwr"}]}]}]}
